title: You can't deny us access!
body:
So Riot, I'am a straight male
(proceeds to be destroyed by triggered [feminists](https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/male-tears))

And its true you kinda fucked up getting exposed, but punishing your loyal player base, constructed of MOSTLY MALES by denying them into a public event, meant for all.

and how are you going to tell if someone binary or not?
if i wanted i can wear gay clothing and pretend to be gay, even if i'm not, or someone that just dosen't dress like their self identified gender, words do lie mate.

so I have decided to start a petition, so Riot will let us in when pax West opens.
https://chn.ge/2ox5Wn0
I started it as I was typing, VOTE FOR OUR FREEDOM!
